body_content.explanation: the quality of being very valuable because of being rare, expensive, or important:
examples: I have always had a sense of the preciousness of life.
As an elder person, part of my role is to try to keep alive the preciousness of history.

body_content.explanation: behaviour that is very formal and unnatural because it gives too much attention to details that are not important and tries too hard to be perfect:
examples: As an actor, he has always tried to avoid preciousness.
We don't want too much preciousness about our ingredients all being locally sourced and organic.
